thread.title: Donald Trump: Betsy DeVos is education secretary as Mike Pence breaks tie
thread.title_full: Donald Trump: Betsy DeVos is education secretary as Mike Pence breaks tie - Times of India

author: Chidanand Rajghatta
title: Donald Trump: Betsy DeVos is education secretary as Mike Pence breaks tie
text:
WASHINGTON: US Vice-President Mike Pence had to cast a tie-breaking vote in the Senate to confirm Betsy DeVos as the country's Education Secretary after the chamber was locked in a 50-50 vote with two Republicans opposing President Trump's nominee. 

It is the first time in US history that a cabinet appointed has required a Vice-Presidential tie-breaker, attesting to the fraught mood in Washington DC after a contentious election. Two Republican Senators, Susan Collins of Maine and Lisa Murkowski of Alaska joined 46 Democrats and two Democrat-caucusing Independents, in an effort to scupper DeVos confirmation. 

Democrats failed to get "just one more" vote that they searched for through an all-night debate as protestors kept vigil outside and online, opposing a nominee widely seen as poorly qualified to serve as education secretary. DeVos is a long-time Republican and is a billionaire from one of Michigan's wealthiest families. 

She had stumbled through her confirmation hearing, inviting ridicule for, among other things, her suggestion that a school in Wyoming might want to have guns on premises to protect against grizzly bears.
